except for those who were forced to engage in infidelity to allah after believing the while their heart remained firmly convinced of their belief the one whose heart willingly embraced disbelief shall incur allah wrath and mighty chastisement lie in store for them
that is because they love the life of this world more than the hereafter and allah doe not guide those who are ungrateful to allah for his favour
they are the one upon whose heart and hearing and eye allah ha set seal they are utterly steeped in heedlessness
no doubt they shall be loser in the hereafter
and surely your lord will be most forgiving and most merciful towards those who left their home after they were persecuted and who thereafter struggled hard and remained constant
allah judgement will come about them all on the day when everyone shall come pleading in his defence and everyone shall be fully requited for his deed and none shall be wronged in the least

most certainly messenger came to them from among them but they rejected him calling him liar therefore chastisement seized them while they engaged in wrong doing
so eat out of the lawful and good sustenance that allah ha bestowed upon you and thank allah for his bounty if it is him that you serve

allah ha forbidden you only carrion and blood and the flesh of swine also any animal over which the name of any other than allah ha been pronounced but whoever eats of them under compelling necessity neither desiring it nor exceeding the limit of absolute necessity surely for such action allah is much forgiving most merciful
and do not utter falsehood by letting your tongue declare this is lawful and that is unlawful thus fabricating lie against allah surely those who fabricate lie against allah will never prosper
brief is their enjoyment of the world and thereafter they shall suffer painful chastisement
we have already recounted to you what we prohibited to the jew in so doing we did not wrong them it is they who wronged themselves
but to those who commit evil out of ignorance and then repent and amend their way thereafter your lord will be much forgiving most merciful

he rendered thanks to allah for his bounty so that allah chose him for his favour and directed him to the right way

then we revealed to you follow the way of abraham with exclusive devotion to allah he wa not one of those who associated others with allah in his divinity
a for the sabbath it wa made incumbent only on those who differed about it law certainly your lord will judge on the day of resurrection between them regarding the matter they disputed

prophet call to the way of your lord with wisdom and goodly exhortation and reason with them in the best manner possible surely your lord know best who ha strayed away from his path and he also know well those who are guided to the right way

and bear with patience muhammad and your patience is only because of the help of allah and do not grieve over them nor feel distressed by their evil plan
for surely allah is with those who hold him in fear and do good

holy is he who carried his servant by night from the holy mosque in makkah to the farther mosque in jerusalem whose surroundings we have blessed that we might show him some of our sign indeed he alone is all hearing all seeing
we gave moses the book and made it source of guidance for the child of israel commanding take no other guardian beside me
you are the descendant of those whom we carried in the ark with noah he wa truly thankful servant

so when the occasion for the first of the transgression arrived we raised against you some of our creature who were full of might and they ran over the whole of your land this wa promise that wa bound to be fulfilled
then we granted you an upper hand against them and strengthened you with wealth and child and multiplied your number

whenever you did good it wa to your own advantage and whenever you committed evil it wa to your own disadvantage so when the time of the fulfilment of the second promise arrived we raised other enemy that would disfigure your face and enter the temple of jerusalem a they had entered the first time and destroy whatever they could lay their hand on
your lord may well show mercy to you but if you revert to your evil behaviour we shall revert to chastising you we have made hell prison for those who are thankless of allah bounty
verily this qur an guide to the way that is the straight most to those who believe in it and do righteous work it give the good news that great reward awaits them
and warns those who do not believe in the hereafter that we have prepared for them grievous chastisement
man prays for evil in the manner he ought to pray for good man is ever hasty

we have made night and day a two sign we made the sign of the night devoid of light and made the sign of the day radiant that you may seek the bounty of your lord and know the computation of year and number thus we have expounded everything in detail to keep everything distinct from the other
we have fastened every man omen to his neck on the day of resurrection we shall produce for him his scroll in the shape of wide open book saying
read your scroll this day you suffice to take account of yourself

he who follows the right way shall do so to his own advantage and he who stray shall incur his own loss no one shall bear another burden and never do we punish any people until we send messenger to make the truth distinct from falsehood
when we decide to destroy town we command the affluent among them whereupon they commit sin in it then the decree of chastisement becomes due against them and thereafter we destroy that town utterly
many generation ha been destroyed by our command since noah time your lord is well aware and fully observant of the sin of his servant

if anyone desire immediate benefit we hasten to grant whatever benefit we will in the present life to whomsoever we please but thereafter we decree for him hell wherein he shall burn condemned and rejected
but he who desire the hereafter and strives for it in the manner he should and is true believer his striving will come to fruition
to all of these a well a those we shall provide the wherewithal of this life in the present world by dint of your lord bounty and from none shall the bounty of your lord be withheld
see how we have exalted some above others in this world and in the life to come they will have higher rank and greater degree of excellence over others
do not set up any other god with allah lest you are rendered humiliated and helpless

your lord ha decreed do not worship any but him ii be good to your parent and should both or any one of them attain old age with you do not say to them even fie neither chide them but speak to them with respect
and be humble and tender to them and say lord show mercy to them a they nurtured me when wa small
your lord is best aware of what is in your heart if you are righteous he will indeed forgive those who relent and revert to serving allah
iii give to the near of kin his due and also to the needy and the wayfarer iv do not squander your wealth wastefully
for those who squander wastefully are satan brother and satan is ever ungrateful to his lord
and when you must turn away from them that is from the destitute the near of kin the needy and the wayfarer in pursuit of god mercy which you expect to receive then speak to them kindly
vi do not keep your hand fastened to your neck nor outspread it altogether outspread for you will be left sitting rebuked destitute
certainly your lord make plentiful the provision of whomsoever he will and straitens it for whomsoever he will he is well aware and is fully observant of all that relates to his servant
vii do not kill your child for fear of want we will provide for them and for you surely killing them is great sin
viii do not even approach fornication for it is an outrageous act and an evil way

ix do not kill any person whom allah ha forbidden to kill except with right we have granted the heir of him who ha been wrongfully killed the authority to claim retribution so let him not exceed in slaying he shall be helped

and do not even go near the property of the orphan except that it be in the best manner till he attains his maturity xi and fulfil the covenant for you will be called to account regarding the covenant
xii give full measure when you measure and weigh with even scale that is fair and better in consequence
xiii do not follow that of which you have no knowledge surely the hearing the sight the heart each of these shall be called to account
xiv do not strut about in the land arrogantly surely you cannot cleave the earth nor reach the height of the mountain in stature
the wickedness of each of that is hateful to your lord
that is part of the wisdom your lord ha revealed to you so do not set up any deity beside allah lest you are cast into hell rebuked and deprived of every good

say muhammad had there been other god with him a they claim they would surely have attempted to find way to the lord of the throne
holy is he and far above all that they say

when you recite the qur an we place hidden barrier between you and those who do not believe in the hereafter

and we place covering on their heart so that they do not comprehend it and we cause heaviness in their ear and when you mention your lord the only true lord in the qur an they turn their back in aversion

on the day when he will call you and you will rise praising him in response to his call and you will believe that you had lain in this state only for while
tell my servant muhammad to say always that which is best verily it is satan who sow discord among people satan indeed is an open enemy to mankind

your lord know all who dwell in the heaven and the earth we have exalted some prophet over others and we gave the psalm to david

do you then feel secure against his causing you to be swallowed up by tract of the earth or letting loose deadly whirlwind charged with stone towards you and there you will find none to protect you

establish prayer from the declining of the sun to the darkness of the night and hold fast to the recitation of the qur an at dawn for the recitation of the qur an at dawn is witnessed

whomsoever allah guide is rightly guided and whomsoever allah let go astray you shall find none apart from him who could protect him we shall muster them all on the day of resurrection on their face blind and dumb and deaf hell shall be their refuge every time it fire subsides we will intensify for them it flame
that will be their recompense because they disbelieved in our sign and said what when we shall be reduced to bone and particle of dust shall we be raised again a new creation

tell them prophet even if you owned the treasure of my lord mercy you would have held them back for fear of spending them man is indeed ever niggardly
we granted moses nine clear sign ask the child of israel about that when these sign came forth pharaoh said to him moses think that you are bewitched
moses replied you know well that no one but the lord of the heaven and the earth ha sent these a eye opening proof truly think pharaoh that you are indeed doomed
at last pharaoh decided to uproot moses and the child of israel from the land but we drowned him together with all who were with him

tell them prophet whether you believe in it or do not believe but when it is recited to those who were given the knowledge before it revelation they fall down upon their face in prostration
and say glory be to our lord surely the promise of our lord wa bound to be fulfilled

say to them prophet call upon him a allah or call upon him a al rahman call him by whichever name you will all his name are beautiful neither offer your prayer in too loud voice nor in voice too low but follow middle course

and say all praise be to allah who ha neither taken to himself son nor ha he any partner in his kingdom nor doe he need anyone out of weakness to protect him so glorify him in manner worthy of his glory
praise be to allah who ha revealed to his servant the book devoid of all crookedness
an unerringly straight book meant to warn of stern punishment from allah and to proclaim to those who believe and work righteous deed the tiding that theirs shall be good reward

thing about which they have no knowledge neither they nor their ancestor dreadful is the word that come out of their mouth what they utter is merely lie
muhammad if they do not believe in this message you will perhaps torment yourself to death with grief sorrowing over them
surely we have made all that is on the earth an embellishment for it in order to test people a to who of them is better in conduct
in the ultimate we shall reduce all that is on the earth to barren plain
do you think that the people of the cave and the inscription were one of our wondrous sign
when those youth sought refuge in the cave and said our lord grant u mercy from yourself and provide for u rectitude in our affair
we lulled them to sleep in that cave for number of year
and then roused them so that we might see which of the two party could best tell the length of their stay
we narrate to you their true story they were party of young men who had faith in their lord and we increased them in guidance

and strengthened their heart when they stood up and proclaimed our lord is the lord of the heaven and the earth we shall call upon no other god beside him for if we did so we shall be uttering blasphemy

then they conferred among themselves and said these men our own people have taken others a god beside him why do they not bring any clear evidence that they indeed are god who can be more unjust than he who foists lie on allah

and now that you have dissociated yourselves from them and from whatever they worship beside allah go and seek refuge in the cave your lord will extend his mercy to you and will provide for you the mean for the disposal of your affair

had you seen them in the cave it would have appeared to you that when the sun rose it moved away from their cave to the right and when it set it turned away from them to the left while they remained in spacious hollow in the cave this is one of the sign of allah whomsoever allah guide he alone is led aright and whomsoever allah let go astray you will find for him no guardian to direct him

on seeing them you would fancy them to be awake though they were asleep and we caused them to turn their side to their right and to their left and their dog sat stretching out it foreleg on the threshold of the cave had you looked upon them you would have certainly fled away from them their sight filling you with terror

likewise we roused them in miraculous way that they might question one another one of them asked how long did you remain in this state the others said we remained so for day or part of day then they said your lord know better how long we remained in this state now send one of you to the city with this coin of yours and let him see who ha the best food and let him buy some provision from there let him be cautious and not inform anyone of our whereabouts
for if they should come upon u they will stone u to death or force u to revert to their faith whereafter we shall never prosper

thus did we make their case known to the people of the city so that they might know that allah promise is true and that there is absolutely no doubt that the hour will come to pas but instead of giving thought to this they disputed with one another concerning the people of the cave some saying build wall over them their lord alone know best about them but those who prevailed over their affair said we shall build place of worship over them

some will say concerning them they were three and their dog the fourth and some will say they were five and their dog the sixth all this being merely guesswork and still others will say they were seven and their dog the eighth say my lord know their number best only few know their correct number so do not dispute concerning their number but stick to what is evident and do not question anyone about them
and never say about anything shall certainly do this tomorrow
unless allah should will it and should you forget and make such statement remember your lord and say expect my lord to guide me to what is nearer to rectitude than this
they remained in the cave for three hundred year and others added nine more year

say allah know best how long they remained in it for only he know all that is hidden in the heaven and the earth how well he see how well he hears the creature have no other guardian than him he allows none to share his authority
prophet recite to them from the book of your lord what ha been revealed to you for none may change his word and were you to make any change in his word you will find no refuge from him

keep yourself content with those who call upon their lord morning and evening seeking his pleasure and do not let your eye pas beyond them do you seek the pomp and glitter of the world do not follow him whose heart we have caused to be heedless of our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose attitude is of excess

and proclaim this is the truth from your lord now let him who will believe and let him who will disbelieve we have prepared fire for the wrong doer whose billowing fold encompass them if they ask for water they will be served with drink like dreg of oil that will scald their face how dreadful drink and how evil an abode
a for those who believe and do good we shall not cause their reward to be lost

they shall dwell in the garden of eternity beneath which stream flow there they will be adorned with bracelet of gold will be arrayed in green garment of silk and rich brocade and will recline on raised couch how excellent is their reward and how nice their resting place
muhammad propound parable to them there were two men of whom we bestowed upon one of the two vineyard surrounding both of them with date palm and putting tillage in between
both the vineyard yielded abundant produce without failure and we caused stream to flow in their midst
so the owner had fruit in abundance and he said to his neighbour while conversing with him have greater wealth than you and am stronger than you in number
then he entered his vine yard and said wronging himself surely do not believe that all this will ever perish
nor do believe that the hour of resurrection will ever come to pas and even if am returned to my lord shall find better place than this
while conversing with him his neighbour exclaimed do you deny him who created you out of dust then out of drop of sperm and then fashioned you into complete man
a for myself allah alone is my lord and associate none with my lord in his divinity
when you entered your vineyard why did you not say whatever allah will shall come to pas for there is no power save with allah if you find me le than yourself in wealth and child
it may well be that my lord will give me something better than your vineyard and send calamity upon your vineyard from the heaven and it will be reduced to barren waste
or the water of your vineyard will be drained deep into the ground so that you will not be able to seek it out

eventually all his produce wa destroyed and he began to wring his hand in sorrow at the loss of what he had spent on it and on seeing it fallen down upon it trellis saying would had not associated anyone with my lord in his divinity
and there wa no host beside allah to help him nor could he be of any help to himself
then he knew that all power of protection rest with allah the true one he is the best to reward the best to determine the end of thing

prophet propound to them the parable of the present life it is like the vegetation of the earth which flourished luxuriantly when it mingled with the water that we sent down from the sky but after that the same vegetation turned into stubble which the wind blew about allah alone ha the power over all thing
wealth and child are an adornment of the life of the world but the deed of lasting righteousness are the best in the sight of your lord in reward and far better source of hope
bear in mind the day when we shall set the mountain in motion and you will find the earth void and bare on that day we shall muster all men together leaving none of them behind

they shall be brought before your lord all lined up and shall be told now indeed you have come before u in the manner we created you in the first instance although you thought that we shall not appoint tryst with u

and then the record of their deed shall be placed before them and you will see the guilty full of fear for what it contains and will say woe to u what record this is it leaf nothing big or small but encompasses it they will find their deed confronting them your lord wrong no one

and recall when we said to the angel prostrate yourselves before adam all of them fell prostrate except iblis he wa of the jinni and so disobeyed the command of his lord will you then take him and his progeny a your guardian rather than me although they are your open enemy what an evil substitute are these wrong doer taking
did not call them to witness the creation of the heaven and the earth nor in their own creation do not seek the aid of those who lead people astray

what will such people do on the day when the lord will say now call upon all those whom you believed to be my partner thereupon they will call upon them but they will not respond to their call and we shall make them common pit of doom
and the guilty shall behold the fire and know that they are bound to fall into it and will find no escape from it
and surely we have explained matter to people in the qur an in diverse way using all manner of parable but man is exceedingly contentious

who is more wicked than the man who when he is reminded by the revelation of his lord turn away from them and forgets the consequence of the deed wrought by his own hand we have laid veil over their heart lest they understand the message of the qur an and we have caused heaviness in their ear call them a you may to the right path they will not be ever guided aright

your lord is all forgiving full of mercy had he wished to take them to task for their doings he would have hastened in sending his scourge upon them but he ha set for them time limit which they cannot evade
all the township afflicted with scourge are before your eye when they committed wrong we destroyed them for the destruction of each we had set definite term
and recount to them the story of moses when moses said to his servant will journey on until reach the point where the two river meet though may march on for age
but when they reached the point where the two river meet they forgot their fish and it took it way into the sea a if through tunnel
when they had journeyed further on moses said to his servant bring u our repast we are surely fatigued by today journey

the servant said did you see what happened when we betook ourselves to the rock to take rest forgot the fish and it is only satan who caused me to forget to mention it to you so that it made it way into the sea in strange manner
moses said that is what we were looking for so the two turned back retracing their footstep
and there they found one of our servant upon whom we had bestowed our mercy and to whom we had imparted special knowledge from ourselves
moses said to him may follow you that you may teach me something of the wisdom which you have been taught
he answered you will surely not be able to bear with me
for how can you patiently bear with something you cannot encompass in your knowledge
moses replied you shall find me if allah will patient and shall not disobey you in anything
he said well if you follow me do not ask me concerning anything until myself mention it to you

then the two went forth until when they embarked on the boat he made hole in it whereupon moses exclaimed have you made hole in it so a to drown the people in the boat you have certainly done an awful thing
he replied did not tell you that you will not be able to patiently bear with me
moses said do not take me to task at my forgetfulness and do not be hard on me
then the two went forth until they met lad whom he slew whereupon moses exclaimed what have you slain an innocent person without his having slain anyone surely you have done horrible thing
he said did not tell you that you will not be able to patiently bear with me
moses said keep me no more in your company if question you concerning anything after this you will then be fully justified

then the two went forth until when they came to town they asked it people for food but they refused to play host to them they found in that town wall that wa on the verge of tumbling down and he buttressed it whereupon moses said if you had wished you could have received payment for it
he said this brings me and you to parting of way now shall explain to you the true meaning of thing about which you could not remain patient
a for the boat it belonged to some poor people who worked on the river and desired to damage it for beyond them lay the dominion of king who wa wont to seize every boat by force
